dc_title_s: Karte der Sprachverteilung, Bevólkerungsdichte und Bodenschätze von Elsass-Lothringen : auf Grund von Heinrich Kieperts Spezialkarte
dc_description_s: Shows language distribution as of the 1910 census, population density as of 1905 and mineral wealth, including iron ore, coal, potash and petroleum.; Relief shown by spot heights.; Date taken from "Fo?rderung der Bodenschätze" table.|101 x 85 centimeters|Scale 1:250,000|General Map Collection
